thread.title: Adele has no time for this security guard who told her fans to sit down
thread.title_full: Adele has no time for this security guard who told her fans to sit down

author: Kayla Bazile
title: Adele has no time for this security guard who told her fans to sit down
text:
Sassy Adele is the best Adele .
The "Love in the Dark" singer is currently touring throughout Australia, leaving a trail of Instagram worthy moments behind her like meeting Elmo and sharing the stage with a very adorable little girl in cat ears.
SEE ALSO: Adele's goofy attempt at dancing like Beyoncé in 'Crazy In Love' is all of us
Elmo, I love you. Thanks for coming, See you in New York X
A post shared by Adele (@adele) on Mar 10, 2017 at 12:19am PST
Melbourne, VIC / Etihad Stadium / Mar 18
A post shared by Adele (@adele) on Mar 18, 2017 at 10:39pm PDT
While performing in Melbourne last night, a fan caught Adele on video calling out a security guard who was telling fans to sit down and stop dancing. She wasn't having it.
The singer explained to the guard, "This is a music show, if people can’t see then they can stand up. And if you’re moaning about people dancing, then what the fuck did you come to a show for?"
Adele telling security to stop telling people to sit down. Isn't she the best! #AdeleMelbourne #adelelive2017 pic.twitter.com/jNQ1tE9eRE
— daydreamer (@Adelefaans) March 19, 2017
Don't mess with queen Adele's fans — she will clap back.
WATCH: Adele's Amazing Anniversary Surprise
